::Zardus/Prowl::

Zardus stumbles back from Dracona's shot and Injector's shot misses his chest 
plate by an inch. Seeing the rest of the alliance act to orders, he flies 
back toward the alliance base. At the edge of the battle field, he turns 
around, firing another shot at Dracona. He turns and flies away.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Prowl looks in the direction the alliance flew off to. He sighs in relief. At 
least they were not all dead. He lifts Iron Raptor to his shoulder. "Come on, 
let's get you to a CR chamber." He says, heading off toward the CR chamber, 
half carrying Iron Raptor.
